channel.title: Madras HC on Internet Freedom Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Madras HC on Internet Freedom Foundation

item.title: Union of India seeks a transfer of cases challenging IT Rules, 2021
item.description: A two-judge bench of the Supreme Court has listed the Union of India’s transfer petition before another bench on 16th July 2021. The petition seeks a transfer to the Supreme Court of 4 cases challenging IT Rules, 2021 which are pending before different High Courts.

item.title: Madras High Court issues notice in petition challenging the Intermediary Rules 2021 by T. M. Krishna
item.description: Madras High issued notice on a writ petition by T.M. Krishna challenging the Intermediary Rules 2021.
